title: Issues on Share Screen
body:
**Describe the bug**
When you try to share your screen for the second time on the same call , the app crashes.
I am using this version of the app 
![image](https://github.com/user-attachments/assets/536d721c-7707-4fef-8bfd-e0aba2aef8f8)
The environment Ubuntu 22.04 with X11
